Classes

  • jsonFormula

Class

JsonFormula

JsonFormula(customFunctionsopt, stringToNumberopt, languageopt, debugopt)

Class represents an instance of a JsonFormula Expression that can be executed later on with multiple instances of JSON Data. The instance of the class has a search function that can be used to evaluate the expression on a json payload.

Constructor

# new JsonFormula(customFunctionsopt, stringToNumberopt, languageopt, debugopt)

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
customFunctions object <optional>
 {}

custom functions needed by a hosting application.
stringToNumber function <optional>
 'null'

A function that converts string values to numbers. Can be used to convert currencies/dates to numbers
language string <optional>
 en-US
debug array <optional>
 []

will be populated with any errors/warnings

# compile(expression, allowedGlobalNamesopt, debugopt)

Creates a compiled expression that can be executed later on with some data.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
expression string

the expression to evaluate
allowedGlobalNames Array.<string> <optional>
 []

A list of names of the global variables being used in the expression.
debug array <optional>
 []

will be populated with any errors/warnings

# run(ast, json, globals) → {*}

Execute a previously compiled expression against a json object and return the result

Parameters:
Name Type Description
ast object

The abstract syntax tree returned from compile()
json object | array

the json data on which the expression needs to be evaluated
globals *

set of objects available in global scope

Evaluates the JsonFormula on a particular json payload and return the result

the json data on which the expression needs to be evaluated
globals object <optional>
